prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Drums, Guitar, Brass, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Organ, Drums, Guitar, Brass, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Drums, Guitar, Brass, and Bass, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Drums, Guitar, Brass, and Bass, but Piano is not present.
